events.name: Hanoi Summer Festival
events.description: Celebrate the vibrant culture of Hanoi with music, food, and traditional performances.

events.name: Hanoi Cyclo Tour
events.description: Experience the charm of Hanoi's Old Quarter on a guided cyclo tour.

events.name: Hanoi Food Tour
events.description: Embark on a culinary adventure and discover the best local street food in Hanoi.

events.name: Hanoi Craft Beer Festival
events.description: Sample a variety of craft beers from local and international breweries in Hanoi.

events.name: Hanoi Ao Dai Festival
events.description: Celebrate the beauty and elegance of the traditional Vietnamese Ao Dai dress.

events.name: Hanoi Balloon Festival
events.description: Marvel at the colorful hot air balloons and enjoy family-friendly activities.

events.name: Hanoi Autumn Festival
events.description: Celebrate the beauty of autumn in Hanoi with cultural performances, art exhibitions, and local cuisine.

events.name: Hanoi Film Festival
events.description: Enjoy a selection of critically acclaimed films from Vietnam and around the world.

events.name: Hanoi Flower Festival
events.description: Admire the vibrant colors and fragrances of various flower species at this annual festival.

events.name: Hanoi Christmas Market
events.description: Get into the holiday spirit with festive decorations, gift shopping, and traditional Christmas treats.
